pkgmetadata.longdescription: The PowerDNS Nameserver is a modern, advanced and high performance authoritative- only nameserver. It is written from scratch and conforms to all relevant DNS standards documents. Furthermore, PowerDNS interfaces with almost any database.

use.flag: Making it possible to use a MyDNS MySQL database with PowerDNS (not recommended for new deployments).
Use a generic socket or pipe as a backend (via JSON RPC requests).
Use a TinyDNS CDB database as backend.
